howItWorks.question: How does the AI Tattoo Generator work?
howItWorks.answer: Type your tattoo idea or upload an image, choose a style, and the AI creates a realistic design you can preview and download instantly.

styles.question: What tattoo design styles are available?
styles.answer: Choose from minimal line art, traditional, watercolor, geometric, hyper-realistic, and moreâ€”so your tattoo matches your vision.

preview.question: How accurate is the AI Tattoo Generator skin preview?
preview.answer: Our AR and photo preview tools give a near-real look at placement, size, and color before you commit.

commercial.question: Can I use AI Tattoo Generator designs commercially?
commercial.answer: Yes, for personal or commercial purposes. We recommend confirming technical feasibility with your tattoo artist.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app version?
mobileApp.answer: Yes. The AI Tattoo Generator app for iOS and Android lets you design, preview, and save tattoos anytime.

editing.question: Can I edit or refine the AI tattoo design?
editing.answer: Absolutelyâ€”tweak style, details, and placement until it's perfect.

section1.title: Hyper-Realistic AI Tattoo Designs
section1.description: Create tattoos that look hand-crafted by a professional artist. Whether minimalist lines or intricate patterns, our AI Tattoo Generator ensures lifelike details in every design, so it feels ready for inking.

section2.title: Endless AI Tattoo Ideas
section2.description: Out of inspiration? Type any keyword or theme, and our AI Tattoo Generator instantly gives you fresh, unique tattoo designs. Explore new styles, discover unexpected combinations, and find the perfect concept for your next piece.

section3.title: AI Tattoo Skin Preview Tool
section3.description: Preview your tattoo on your skin with AR or photo. See placement, size, and color in secondsâ€”making sure you're 100% confident before the real ink touches your skin.
